DEMOUSER.message: give me data of hotel name and price of yesterday
give me the avg hotel price per location

SELECT LOCATION, AVG(ORIGINAL_PRICE) AS AVG_PRICE
FROM SCRAPED_DATA
WHERE TRUNC(SCRAPED_DATETIME) = TRUNC(SYSDATE - 1)
GROUP BY LOCATION;
give me hotel name and avg price

SELECT 
    HOTEL_NAME, 
    AVG(ORIGINAL_PRICE) AS AVG_PRICE
FROM 
    SCRAPED_DATA
GROUP BY 
    HOTEL_NAME;
give me location and minimum price

SELECT 
    LOCATION, 
    MIN(ORIGINAL_PRICE) AS MIN_PRICE
FROM 
    SCRAPED_DATA
GROUP BY 
    LOCATION;
give me hotel name and avg price

    HOTEL_NAME,

    HOTEL_NAME;

SELECT 
    HOTEL_NAME, 
    AVG(ORIGINAL_PRICE) AS AVG_PRICE
FROM 
    SCRAPED_DATA
WHERE 
    AVAILABILITY = 'Available'
GROUP BY 
    HOTEL_NAME;
